column4: i want to create a vmware image of windows xp, is there a way besides installing windows and using vmware converter?
you can create an image by installing XP using vmware-server
yw.  btw, vmware-server is available in feisty-commercial
it might be available via Applications -> Add/Remove...
cool, otherwise I can give you the sources.list line
a quick search got me the sources.lost line
and you were right, server is in add/remove apps
only problem, is that vmware player and vmware server conflict. cannot be installed at the same time.
though, i can create the image with server. and then use it with player. i dont necessarily need both installed at the same time.
